reviews.text: Sant Jordi is a friendly, quiet hostel in a good location in Barcelona. The people at reception were extremely friendly and helpful with suggestions, and the lounge area and 2 internet stations were helpful - often you have to pay at hostels. We stayed in a TINY triple - barely room for beds and one bag. Not really worse than many places in Europe, but don't come expecting to hang out in your room. There is a fan in the room for the summer, which helps. The location is great - a good walk from the train station but you can take the subway if you don't want the exercise. The area is safe. The Ritz is a block away if you want an AWESOME breakfast :-)
reviews.title: Friendly people, small rooms
